text: CHECKPOINTS The WAL will grow forever. After a crash, the DBMS has to replay the entire log which will take a long time. The DBMS periodically takes a checkpoint where it flushes all buffers out to disk. £2CMUDB o, - |< ’ }l ‘D 1:05:56 / 1:15:18 - BUFFER POOL POLICIES > m * E D :: 20 - Database Logging Schemes (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
